WorkAccess.name: WorkAccess
WorkAccess.description: Used to grant or restrict user access to give badge definitions. Each badge definition record must have one WorkAccess record.

AccessType.description: Define the type of Access given to user (“Give”).

OwnerId.description: Salesforce unique ID for owner of Access record.

ParentId.description: Salesforce unique ID for BadgeDefinition record associated with this Access record.
